name: okato
description: Okato application - Stock Exchange trading sessions

scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:server && npm run postinstall:client
scripts.build:server: cd server/ && npm run build && mv build/ ../build/
scripts.build:client: cd client/ && npm run build && mv build/ ../build/client/
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
